comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7) Gecko/20040614 Firefox/0.9
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7) Gecko/20040614 Firefox/0.9

there is a search field that is not shown and when expanding the menues on the
left, it expands everything instead of only on level of submenues

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
1. go to http://arcobjectsonline.esri.com/
2. click on "Samples"


Actual Results:  
All the submenues are shown

Expected Results:  
Only show the first level of submenues
comments.creator: jeff.konnen@a3.epfl.ch

comments.raw_text:
These guys serve different pages to IE and Netscape/Mozilla/Firefox. For the
page that's served, this is the correct behaviour.
